name: Shakir
text: Alif Lam Ra. These are the verses of the Book and (of) a Quran that makes (things) clear.

name: Shakir
text: Often will those who disbelieve wish that they had been Muslims.

name: Shakir
text: Leave them that they may eat and enjoy themselves and (that) hope may beguile them, for they will soon know.

name: Shakir
text: And never did We destroy a town but it had a term made known.

name: Shakir
text: No people can hasten on their doom nor can they postpone (it).

name: Shakir
text: And they say: O you to whom the Reminder has been revealed! you are most surely insane:

name: Shakir
text: Why do you not bring to us the angels if you are of the truthful ones?

name: Shakir
text: We do not send the angels but with truth, and then they would not be respited.

name: Shakir
text: Surely We have revealed the Reminder and We will most surely be its guardian.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We sent (apostles) before you among the nations of yore.

name: Shakir
text: And there never came an apostle to them but they mocked him.

name: Shakir
text: Thus do We make it to enter into the hearts of the guilty;

name: Shakir
text: They do not believe in it, and indeed the example of the former people has already passed.

name: Shakir
text: And even if We open to them a gateway of heaven, so that they ascend into it all the while,

name: Shakir
text: They would certainly say: Only our eyes have been covered over, rather we are an enchanted people.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We have made strongholds in the heaven and We have made it fair seeming to the beholders.

name: Shakir
text: And We guard it against every accursed Shaitan,

name: Shakir
text: But he who steals a hearing, so there follows him a visible flame.

name: Shakir
text: And the earth-- We have spread it forth and made in it firm mountains and caused to grow in it of every suitable thing.

name: Shakir
text: And We have made in it means of subsistence for you and for him for whom you are not the suppliers.

name: Shakir
text: And there is not a thing but with Us are the treasures of it, and We do not send it down but in a known measure.

name: Shakir
text: And We send the winds fertilizing, then send down water from the cloud so We give it to you to drink of, nor is it you who store it up.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely We bring to life and cause to die and We are the heirs.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We know those of you who have gone before and We certainly know those who shall come later.

name: Shakir
text: And surely your Lord will gather them together; surely He is Wise, Knowing.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We created man of clay that gives forth sound, of black mud fashioned in shape.

name: Shakir
text: And the jinn We created before, of intensely hot fire.

name: Shakir
text: And when your Lord said to the angels: Surely I am going to create a mortal of the essence of black mud fashioned in shape.

name: Shakir
text: So when I have made him complete and breathed into him of My spirit, fall down making obeisance to him.

name: Shakir
text: So the angels made obeisance, all of them together,

name: Shakir
text: But Iblis (did it not); he refused to be with those who made obeisance.

name: Shakir
text: He said: O Iblis! what excuse have you that you are not with those who make obeisance?

name: Shakir
text: He said: I am not such that I should make obeisance to a mortal whom Thou hast created of the essence of black mud fashioned in shape.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Then get out of it, for surely you are driven away:

name: Shakir
text: And surely on you is curse until the day of judgment.

name: Shakir
text: He said: My Lord! then respite me till the time when they are raised.

name: Shakir
text: He said: So surely you are of the respited ones

name: Shakir
text: Till the period of the time made known.

name: Shakir
text: He said: My Lord! because Thou hast made life evil to me, I will certainly make (evil) fair-seeming to them on earth, and I will certainly cause them all to deviate

name: Shakir
text: Except Thy servants from among them, the devoted ones.

name: Shakir
text: He said: This is a right way with Me:

name: Shakir
text: Surely. as regards My servants, you have no authority, over them except those who follow you of the deviators.

name: Shakir
text: And surely Hell is the promised place of them all:

name: Shakir
text: It has seven gates; for every gate there shall be a separate party of them.

name: Shakir
text: Surely those who guard (against evil) shall be in the midst of gardens and fountains:

name: Shakir
text: Enter them in peace, secure.

name: Shakir
text: And We will root out whatever of rancor is in their breasts-- (they shall be) as brethren, on raised couches, face to face.

name: Shakir
text: Toil shall not afflict them in it, nor shall they be ever ejected from it.

name: Shakir
text: Inform My servants that I am the Forgiving, the Merciful,

name: Shakir
text: And that My punishment-- that is the painful punishment.

name: Shakir
text: And inform them of the guests of Ibrahim:

name: Shakir
text: When they entered upon him, they said, Peace. He said: Surely we are afraid of you.

name: Shakir
text: They said: Be not afraid, surely we give you the good news of a boy, possessing knowledge.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Do you give me good news (of a son) when old age has come upon me?-- Of what then do you give me good news!

name: Shakir
text: They said: We give you good news with truth, therefore be not of the despairing.

name: Shakir
text: He said: And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord but the erring ones?

name: Shakir
text: He said: What is your business then, O apostles?

name: Shakir
text: They said: Surely we are sent towards a guilty people,

name: Shakir
text: Except Lut's followers: We will most surely deliver them all,

name: Shakir
text: Except his wife; We ordained that she shall surely be of those who remain behind.

name: Shakir
text: So when the apostles came to Lut's followers,

name: Shakir
text: He said: Surely you are an unknown people.

name: Shakir
text: They said: Nay, we have come to you with that about which they disputed.

name: Shakir
text: And we have come to you with the truth, and we are most surely truthful.

name: Shakir
text: Therefore go forth with your followers in a part of the night and yourself follow their rear, and let not any one of you turn round, and go forth whither you are commanded.

name: Shakir
text: And We revealed to him this decree, that the roots of these shall be cut off in the morning.

name: Shakir
text: And the people of the town came rejoicing.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Surely these are my guests, therefore do not disgrace me,

name: Shakir
text: And guard against (the punishment of) Allah and do not put me to shame.

name: Shakir
text: They said: Have we not forbidden you from (other) people?

name: Shakir
text: He said: These are my daughters, if you will do (aught).

name: Shakir
text: By your life! they were blindly wandering on in their intoxication.

name: Shakir
text: So the rumbling overtook them (while) entering upon the time of sunrise;

name: Shakir
text: Thus did We turn it upside down, and rained down upon them stones of what had been decreed.

name: Shakir
text: Surely in this are signs for those who examine.

name: Shakir
text: And surely it is on a road that still abides.

name: Shakir
text: Most surely there is a sign in this for the believers.

name: Shakir
text: And the dwellers of the thicket also were most surely unjust.

name: Shakir
text: So We inflicted retribution on them, and they are both, indeed, on an open road (still) pursued.

name: Shakir
text: And the dwellers of the Rock certainly rejected the apostles;

name: Shakir
text: And We gave them Our communications, but they turned aside from them;

name: Shakir
text: And they hewed houses in the mountains in security.

name: Shakir
text: So the rumbling overtook them in the morning;

name: Shakir
text: And what they earned did not avail them.

name: Shakir
text: And We did not create the heavens and the earth and what is between them two but in truth; and the hour is most surely coming, so turn away with kindly forgiveness.

name: Shakir
text: Surely your Lord is the Creator of all things, the Knowing.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We have given you seven of the oft-repeated (verses) and the grand Quran.

name: Shakir
text: Do not strain your eyes after what We have given certain classes of them to enjoy, and do not grieve for them, and make yourself gentle to the believers.

name: Shakir
text: And say: Surely I am the plain warner.

name: Shakir
text: Like as We sent down on the dividers

name: Shakir
text: Those who made the Quran into shreds.

name: Shakir
text: So, by your Lord, We would most certainly question them all,

name: Shakir
text: As to what they did.

name: Shakir
text: Therefore declare openly what you are bidden and turn aside from the polytheists.

name: Shakir
text: Surely We will suffice you against the scoffers

name: Shakir
text: Those who set up another god with Allah; so they shall soon know.

name: Shakir
text: And surely We know that your breast straitens at what they say;

name: Shakir
text: Therefore celebrate the praise of your Lord, and be of those who make obeisance.

name: Shakir
text: And serve your Lord until there comes to you that which is certain.
